author: Sean Highkin
title: Re-Drafting the 2007 NBA Draft Class
description: The 2007 NBA draft is most commonly known as the "Oden-Durant draft." It was obvious throughout the previous college season that the top two picks would be Ohio State center Greg Oden ...
content:
Ned Dishman/Getty Images
21. Philadelphia 76ers: Nick Young
"Swaggy P" was known early on as a part of the dysfunctional Washington Wizards teams that included JaVale McGee, Andray Blatche and post-peak Gilbert Arenas. But Young overcame that reputation and… [+2693 chars]
